channel.title: AD on XenoBlog
channel.description: Recent content in AD on XenoBlog

item.title: ADMGS (Active Directory Management Gateway Service)
item.description: There has been some speculation on the web regarding the ADMGS for Server 2008 and 2003, if it would be possible to use it, in an environment without at least one Server 2008 R2.

item.title: PowerShell TombStone revival
item.description: Our friend Darren Mar-Elia over at SDM software has just released some nice PowerShell cmdlets, toÂ view Tombstoned objects in AD… You can even revive(or reanimate them as I think the correct AD term is) them as well.
